entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0135.9835] The element us-gaap:DerivativeAssets has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case the following element(s) us-gaap:DerivativeAssetStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleEnumeration should be used to identify the account where the financial statement element us-gaap:DerivativeAssets is included.
If the filing does not disclose the financial statement captions where the amounts appear, an extension element DerivativeAssetStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleEnumerationNotDisclosedFlag can be used. If this element is used, the rule will not produce an error. The monetary fact value however still needs to be reported in the filing.
The following is an example of a fact that does not have an extensible list.
Concept : us-gaap:DerivativeAssets Value : 308,000,000 Period : 2023-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel2Member, us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember Unit : USD Decimals: -6
Rule Element Id:9835 Rule version: 26.0.12 - rtx-20241231.htm 8

[DQC.US.0135.9835] The element us-gaap:DerivativeLiabilities has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case the following element(s) us-gaap:DerivativeLiabilityStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleEnumeration should be used to identify the account where the financial statement element us-gaap:DerivativeLiabilities is included.
If the filing does not disclose the financial statement captions where the amounts appear, an extension element DerivativeLiabilityStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleEnumerationNotDisclosedFlag can be used. If this element is used, the rule will not produce an error. The monetary fact value however still needs to be reported in the filing.
The following is an example of a fact that does not have an extensible list.
Concept : us-gaap:DerivativeLiabilities Value : 451,000,000 Period : 2024-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:FairValueByMeasurementBasisAxis=us-gaap:EstimateOfFairValueFairValueDisclosureMember, us-gaap:FairValueByFairValueHierarchyLevelAxis=us-gaap:FairValueInputsLevel2Member Unit : USD Decimals: -6
Rule Element Id:9835 Rule version: 26.0.12 - rtx-20241231.htm 8

[DQC.US.0135.9835] The element us-gaap:AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingencies has been used in the filing but does not appear in the financial statements of the filing. This disclosure should appear in the face financials unless it is included in another account caption. If this is the case the following element(s) us-gaap:EnvironmentalLossContingencyStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleEnumeration should be used to identify the account where the financial statement element us-gaap:AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingencies is included.
If the filing does not disclose the financial statement captions where the amounts appear, an extension element EnvironmentalLossContingencyStatementOfFinancialPositionExtensibleEnumerationNotDisclosedFlag can be used. If this element is used, the rule will not produce an error. The monetary fact value however still needs to be reported in the filing.
The following is an example of a fact that does not have an extensible list.
Concept : us-gaap:AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingencies Value : 800,000,000 Period : 2023-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD Decimals: -8
Rule Element Id:9835 Rule version: 26.0.12 - rtx-20241231.htm 8
